name: VERWANDLUNG
description:
A game by Boie

Made as part of the Haunted PS1 Halloween Jam 2022

Controls:

- Use the WASD keys to move

- Use the mouse to look around

- Press E to interact

- Hold LMB to hold items (then press E to use the item when possible)

WARNING: This game contains flickering lights/images, spooky insects and loud noises
